```{r pancreas 31951010, include=FALSE}

PMID_31951010 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('31951010', database = 'PubMed')

citation_31951010 <- paste0(PMID_31951010$journal,' ', PMID_31951010$year, ' ', PMID_31951010$month,';', PMID_31951010$volume,'(', PMID_31951010$number,'):', PMID_31951010$pages)

PubMed_31951010 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_31951010$eprint)

doi_31951010 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_31951010$doi)

Sys.sleep(1)

```
